abstract: The police are investigating whether an attack on a woman in Sunset Park is related to a string of sexual assaults that have occurred since March.
snippet: The police are investigating whether an attack on a woman in Sunset Park is related to a string of sexual assaults that have occurred since March.
lead_paragraph: A man crept up behind a woman in Sunset Park, Brooklyn, on Monday evening, groped her and then ran away, the police said.

headline.main: Another Sexual Assault Is Reported in Brooklyn
